timeline.author: oscerd

replies.bodyText: I do not see that box would depend on netty. Is the property really necessary?
replies.author: ppalaga

timeline.bodyText: Hm... this seems to match an empty BOX_USER_NAME. I am not sure defining an empty env var is possible though. Anyway, something like .+ would perhaps be better, WDYT?
timeline.author: ppalaga
